Package com.intellij.util.ui.accessibility

Class AccessibleContextDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.accessibility.AccessibleContext
      • com.intellij.util.ui.accessibility.AbstractAccessibleContextDelegate
        • com.intellij.util.ui.accessibility.AccessibleContextDelegate

  • public abstract class AccessibleContextDelegate
extends AbstractAccessibleContextDelegate
    AccessibleContext implementation that delegates all calls to another context. This is useful when a component needs to expose an AccessibleContext where most of the implementation comes from another context while at the same a specific subset of the behavior can be overridden.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessibleParent

        public javax.accessibility.Accessible getAccessibleParent()
        The parent should be the Swing parent of the delegate, not the parent of the wrapped context, because the parent of the wrapped context is ourselves, i.e. this would result in an infinite accessible parent chain.
        Overrides:
        getAccessibleParent in class AbstractAccessibleContextDelegate
